mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id, process_name AS processName, type_id AS typeId, process_descriptor AS processDescriptor, xml_img_base64 AS xmlImgBase64, process_key AS processKey FROM t_work_flow_jbpm_xml WHERE 1 = 1
LIMIT ${start}, ${end}

SELECT id AS id, process_name AS processName, type_id AS typeId, process_descriptor AS processDescriptor, xml_img_base64 AS xmlImgBase64, process_key AS processKey FROM t_work_flow_jbpm_xml WHERE 1 = 1
AND id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS count FROM t_work_flow_jbpm_xml WHERE 1 = 1
